name: Rye Rye
description: '''Ryeisha Rochelle Berrain''' (born November 25, 1990), known by her stage name '''Rye Rye''', is an American rapper, singer, dancer and actress. Signed to [[N.E.E.T. Recordings]], she released her first mixtape RYEot PowRR in 2011 and her anticipated debut album ''[[Go! Pop! Bang!]]'' on May 15, 2012. In early 2009, [[MSNBC]] listed Rye Rye as one of the "5Top: Top of the pops! Up-and coming young singers." In 2011, Rye Rye was named one of ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''{{'}}s "21 Under 21". Rye Rye made her acting debut in the 2012 film ''[[21 Jump Street (film)|21 Jump Street]]''.
